DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether dutasteride may influence expression angiogenesis factor hypoxia inducible factor ( HIF ) -1alpha vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) patient low urinary tract symptoms/benign prostatic hyperplasia ( LUTS/BPH ) .
DOC.detailed_description: A total 41 patient await transurethral resection prostate ( TURP ) divide two group ( 1:1 ) ; twenty patient receive medication 21 receive 0.5 mg dutasteride daily 2 4 week TURP . In group , extent , intensity intracellular location hypoxia inducible factor ( HIF ) -1alpha vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) evaluate . Microvessel density also compare two group .
DOC.criteria: inform consent 50 year old old International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) > 8 Maximum flow rate ( Qmax ) < 15 ml/s transurethral resection prostate ( TURP ) urethral catheter urinary tract infection ( UTI ) liver disease renal disease unexplained hematuria prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) > 4ng/ml ( include prostate biopsy negative ) interstitial cystitis bladder cancer prostate cancer pelvic surgery irradiation
